column1: '''Noel''' is the title of a poem by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]. It was published together with the poem "[[Shadow-Bride|The Shadow Man]]" in the [[Annual of Our Lady's School (1936)|''Annual'' of Our Lady's School]] in [[1936]]. According to [[Wayne G. Hammond]] and [[Christina Scull]]
column4: celebrating the birth of Christ".<ref>{{webcite|author=[[Wayne Hammond]]

column1: Grim was the world and grey last night:
The moon and stars were fled
The hall was dark without song or light
